personal.name: Kritagya Khandelwal
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.about: I am currently working in Indian Fintech Unicorn, Yubi. I have contributed to build Yubi's marketplace, I was part of the core team to build the BRE for Yubi. I am a firm believer of self-written quote "Evolution is randomness seeking betterment" and therefore often found thinking about unprecedented possibilities.

experience.description: Mentor and build microservices from the ground up using Java, Springboot, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, Temporal, and Kafka. Implemented CQRS flow and adopted GraphQL as the API architecture. Optimized Homepage load time by 5x by introducing GraphQL and reactive/async programming in backend reducing network calls and latency.

Developed backend APIs using FastAPI (Python) and PostgreSQL; handled message queuing with RabbitMQ. Automated accessibility validation on auto-generated webpages using DOM & CSSOM parsing with Python.
Developed frontend with ReactJS and implemented real-time communication using socket.io. Created server-side APIs with Node.js, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and REST architecture.

Worked as a full-stack developer. Developed Facebook Instant Game from Scratch. Deployed backend webhook on AWS EC2 instance using apache server. Built Frontend using Javascript, JQuery, DOM with integrating Facebook Instant Games, Messanger APIs to the app, and made the app live for public users.

Worked on RHEL physical servers. Automated the OS installation with the help of anaconda file, Mount point syncing between two servers for critical data backups. Apache Server installation in RHEL 7 server and hosting a webpage.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: I am mostly working on the Backend part of the Software systems. I have working on multiple languages: Java, Python, Javascript and Ruby. Frameworks I have used: SpringBoot, FastAPI, ExpressJS and ROR. I have worked on multiple Database and messaging Queues: Postgres, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Kafka, RabbitMQ.

services.title: Artificial Intelligence
services.description: Since my college days I have been very curious about AI and did my major project as well in the same field. where I have used Neural Networks and Genetic Algorithm to simulate Evolution of Ants. Now I am also exploring Agentic AI and created some projects with that as well, more coming.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: In my internships I got chance to work on Frontend where I first worked on venila Javascript, JQuery and then worked with sophisticated frameworks like ReactJS. I love doing side projects, I try to present the work once in a while and for that purposes I work Frontend mostly.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Developed a couple of android apps for flight booking for The Ministry of Aviation under Smart India Hackathon 2019. Also developed a music player app during my training in the first year. Used both java and Kotlin for development. Also, explored react-native a bit

services.title: 3D Game Development
services.description: Explored my interest in 3-D gaming by simulating my hostel digitally, using Unreal Engine for level development and blender for 3-D object development. Check out the work section to see its demonstration.

projects.title: RHEL Server Management
projects.subtitle: Airtel Internship
projects.description: Managed RHEL physical servers and automated OS installation using Anaconda file. Synchronized mount points for critical data backups between servers. Installed and configured Apache server on RHEL 7 to host webpages.

projects.title: Facebook Instant Game
projects.subtitle: Destiny Design Internship
projects.description: Full-stack development of a Facebook Instant Game from scratch. Deployed backend webhook on AWS EC2 using Apache server, openSSL, and Node.js. Integrated Facebook Instant Games and Messenger APIs.

projects.title: Real-time Communication Platform
projects.subtitle: GrowthGear Internship
projects.description: Developed frontend with ReactJS and implemented real-time communication using socket.io. Created server-side APIs with Node.js, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and REST architecture. Improved backend performance by integrating Redis caching.

projects.title: DocumentorAI
projects.subtitle: AI Agent for Documentation
projects.description: An AI agent that analyzes codebases and generates comprehensive documentation with layered understanding of project components and their relationships.

projects.title: Artificial Evolution of Artificial Ant
projects.subtitle: AI Simulation Project
projects.description: Simulated an artificial environment where an ant navigates to find and eat food. Used Neural Networks and Genetic Algorithm to simulate Evolution of Ants.

projects.title: Multi-Player Uno Game: Muno
projects.subtitle: Python Game Development
projects.description: Multi-player Uno game supporting simultaneous players under server-client architecture using TCP protocol. Developed with Python's pygame module and implemented multi-threading.

projects.title: CourseFair Platform
projects.subtitle: Educational Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive educational platform for course management and student interaction.

projects.title: Secrets - Social Platform
projects.subtitle: Anonymous Social Network
projects.description: An anonymous social networking platform where users can share secrets and thoughts anonymously.

projects.title: Flight Booking Android App
projects.subtitle: Smart India Hackathon 2019
projects.description: Project done for Ministry of Civil Aviation during Smart India Hackathon 2019. Designed to provide transparency on subsidy distribution ensuring eligibility.

projects.title: Flappy Bird Clone
projects.subtitle: Game Development
projects.description: A clone of the popular Flappy Bird game developed as a learning project.

projects.title: 3-D Map of my Hostel: Digital Himgiri
projects.subtitle: 3D Environment Simulation
projects.description: Digital simulation of a hostel environment. Used Unreal Engine 4 for level development and Blender for 3D model creation. Applied real object images for realistic materials.

projects.title: Time Table Generator
projects.subtitle: Academic Tool
projects.description: An automated tool for generating academic timetables with conflict resolution and optimization.

blogs.title: Customizing Spring Security in SpringBoot WebFlux Services
blogs.description: A comprehensive guide on implementing and customizing Spring Security in reactive SpringBoot WebFlux services, covering authentication, authorization, and security best practices.

blogs.title: Implementing CQRS Pattern in Microservices Architecture
blogs.description: Deep dive into Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) pattern implementation in microservices, with practical examples and performance considerations.

blogs.title: Optimizing GraphQL Performance in Production
blogs.description: Practical strategies for optimizing GraphQL performance in production environments, including query optimization, caching strategies, and monitoring.

blogs.title: Simulating Evolution with Neural Networks and Genetic Algorithms
blogs.description: Exploring the intersection of AI and biology through the simulation of ant evolution using neural networks and genetic algorithms.
